dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Notice ID: 197-13853
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: bsa-no-reply2@copyright-compliance.com
[mailto:bsa-no-reply2@copyright-compliance.com] 
Posted At: Friday, November 17, 2006 6:28 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Copyright Infringement Notice ID: 197-13853
Subject: Copyright Infringement Notice ID: 197-13853


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

17 Nov 2006 23:00:47 GMT

Everyones Internet


RE:  Unauthorized Distribution of the following copyrighted computer
program(s):

Dear Sir/Madam:

The Business Software Alliance (BSA) has determined that the above
connection, which appears to be using an Internet account under your
control, is using a P2P network seen below to offer unlicensed copies of
copyrighted computer programs published by the BSA's member companies.

Evidentiary Information:
Notice ID: 13853
Asset: Adobe Creative Suite
Protocol: BitTorrent
IP Address:  66.98.144.138
DNS: 
File Name:
Adobe.Creative.Suite.Production.Studio.Premium-iNSPiRON/iNSPiRON-ACSPSPD
2.rar
File Size: 2529126669
Timestamp: 15 Nov 2006 06:23:58 GMT
Last Seen Date: 15 Nov 2006 06:23:58 GMT
URL: 
Username (if available):

URL: 
Username (if available): 





Evidentiary Information:
Notice ID: 13853
Asset: Adobe Creative Suite
Protocol: BitTorrent
IP Address:  66.98.144.138
DNS: 
File Name:
Adobe.Creative.Suite.Production.Studio.Premium-iNSPiRON/iNSPiRON-ACSPSPD
4.rar
File Size: 2131203301
Timestamp: 15 Nov 2006 06:23:58 GMT
Last Seen Date: 15 Nov 2006 06:23:58 GMT
URL: 
Username (if available): 







The above computer program(s) is/are being made available for copying,
through downloading, at the above location without authorization from
the copyright owner(s).

Based upon BSA's representation of the copyright owners in anti-piracy
matters, we have a good faith belief that none of the materials or
activities listed above have been authorized by the rightholders, their
agents, or the law.  BSA represents that the information in this
notification is accurate and states, under penalty of perjury, that it
is authorized to act in this matter on behalf of the copyright owners
listed above.

We are giving notice of these activities pursuant to Section 512 of
Title 17 of the U.S. Code (as enacted by the 'Online Copyright
Infringement Liability Limitation Act').  We expect that you will take
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the materials
described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and
distribution of pirated software via your company's network. As you
know, illegal on-line activities can result in 50 million people on the
Internet accessing and downloading a copyrighted product worldwide
without authorization - a highly damaging activity for the copyright
holder.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us
regarding what actions you take.

Please include the following Notice ID in any response you send: 
197-13853

Please respond indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this
matter. The provided link has been assigned to this matter
http://webreply.baytsp.com/webreply/webreply.jsp?customerid=197&commhash
=54161b887e1111603020a1d44db38401. 

For email correspondence, please reference the above Notice ID in the
subject line
mailto:bsa@copyright-compliance.com?subject=RE%3A%20Copyright%20Infringe
ment%20Notice%20ID%3A%20197%2D13853.

Yours sincerely,


John R. Wolfe
Manager of Investigations
Business Software Alliance
1150 18th St NW Suite 700
Washington, DC 20036
URL: http://www.bsa.org
E-mail: bsa@copyright-compliance.com
1-888-667-4722

- ---Start ACNS XML
